Submitter Information: Shenzhen Beacon Display Technology Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for 8MP Color LCD Displays C811W, C811WT, PA27, PA27T intended for digital pathology slide review and primary diagnosis.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use to display digital images of histopathology slides from IVD-labeled whole-slide imaging scanners, aiding pathologists in reviewing and interpreting images for primary diagnosis; not intended for frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
